author: Marina Liao
title: Blue Ivy Wore a Prince-Inspired Suit That Caught Everyone's Attention

organizations.name: attention blue ivy wearing pink gucci suit grammys 2017 blue ivy wore

text:
Blue Ivy Wearing Pink Gucci Suit Grammys 2017 Blue Ivy Wore a Prince-Inspired Suit That Caught Everyone's Attention February 12, 2017   Blue Ivy Wore a Prince-Inspired Suit That Caught Everyone's Attention 
After some speculation over Blue Ivy's Grammys look (many thought she would wear a dress ), the little girl surprised everyone in a pink Gucci suit. The three-piece set appeared to be a tribute to music legend Prince with stylish elements like a ruffled high-neck shirt and black lapel blazer. Of course, Blue made the outfit her own by accessorizing with a glittery animal purse that matched her hot pink outfit. 
She looked every bit as stylish as the rest of her family , including mother Beyoncé who gave one of the best performances of the night. Read on to see Blue's outfit from head to toe. It will have you asking one question: does that come in our size?
